quote: The reward for work well done is the opportunity to do more.
author: Jonas Salk

quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Be regular and orderly in your life, so that you may be violent and original in your work.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
author: Harry Golden

quote: Hard work spotlights the character of people: some turn up their sleeves, some turn up their noses, and some don't turn up at all.
author: Sam Ewing

quote: All things are difficult before they are easy.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
author: Rumi

quote: Let us realize that: the privilege to work is a gift, the power to work is a blessing, the love of work is success!
author: David O. McKay

quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: Working hard and working smart sometimes can be two different things.
author: Byron Dorgan

quote: The power of one, if fearless and focused, is formidable, but the power of many working together is better.
author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

quote: When your work speaks for itself, don't interrupt.
author: Henry J. Kaiser

quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
author: Plato

quote: Honor lies in honest toil.
author: Grover Cleveland

quote: Nobody ever drowned in his own sweat.
author: Ann Landers

quote: Work is much more fun than fun.
author: Noel Coward

quote: It's like Forrest Gump said, 'Life is like a box of chocolates.' Your career is like a box of chocolates - you never know what you're going to get. But everything you get is going to teach you something along the way and make you the person you are today. That's the exciting part - it's an adventure in itself.
author: Nick Carter

quote: Without labor nothing prospers.
author: Sophocles

quote: Good things happen to those who hustle.
author: Chuck Noll

quote: The only way to enjoy anything in this life is to earn it first.
author: Ginger Rogers

quote: I put my heart and my soul into my work, and have lost my mind in the process.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work, so most people don't recognize them.
author: Ann Landers

quote: Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Nothing ever comes to one, that is worth having, except as a result of hard work.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: When you form a team, why do you try to form a team? Because teamwork builds trust and trust builds speed.
author: Russel Honore

quote: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: When a man tells you that he got rich through hard work, ask him: 'Whose?'
author: Don Marquis

quote: Unemployment is capitalism's way of getting you to plant a garden.
author: Orson Scott Card

quote: I've learned from experience that if you work harder at it, and apply more energy and time to it, and more consistency, you get a better result. It comes from the work.
author: Louis C. K.

quote: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: All life demands struggle. Those who have everything given to them become lazy, selfish, and insensitive to the real values of life. The very striving and hard work that we so constantly try to avoid is the major building block in the person we are today.
author: Pope Paul VI

quote: I believe in stopping work and eating lunch.
author: L'Wren Scott

quote: There is no substitute for hard work.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Quality is everyone's responsibility.
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote: He who seeks rest finds boredom. He who seeks work finds rest.
author: Dylan Thomas

quote: Never continue in a job you don't enjoy. If you're happy in what you're doing, you'll like yourself, you'll have inner peace. And if you have that, along with physical health, you will have had more success than you could possibly have imagined.
author: Johnny Carson

quote: Careers, like rockets, don't always take off on time. The trick is to always keep the engine running.
author: Gary Sinise

quote: Work, look for peace and calm in work: you will find it nowhere else.
author: Dmitri Mendeleev

quote: Working hard is very important. You're not going to get anywhere without working extremely hard.
author: George Lucas

quote: Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed.
author: George Burns

quote: The supreme accomplishment is to blur the line between work and play.
author: Arnold J. Toynbee

quote: By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.
author: Robert Frost

quote: The best preparation for good work tomorrow is to do good work today.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Individual commitment to a group effort - that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: All wealth is the product of labor.
author: John Locke

quote: For me, every day is a new thing. I approach each project with a new insecurity, almost like the first project I ever did. And I get the sweats. I go in and start working, I'm not sure where I'm going. If I knew where I was going I wouldn't do it.
author: Frank Gehry

quote: It is an immutable law in business that words are words, explanations are explanations, promises are promises-but only performance is reality.
author: Harold S. Geneen

quote: Organizing is what you do before you do something, so that when you do it, it is not all mixed up.
author: A. A. Milne

quote: Every man's work, whether it be literature, or music or pictures or architecture or anything else, is always a portrait of himself.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: One thing I never want to be accused of is not working.
author: Don Shula

quote: A man's work is nothing but this slow trek to rediscover, through the detours of art, those two or three great and simple images in whose presence his heart first opened.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Management is nothing more than motivating other people.
author: Lee Iacocca

quote: And where I excel is ridiculous, sickening, work ethic. You know, while the other guy's sleeping? I'm working.
author: Will Smith

quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
author: Unknown

quote: The brain is a wonderful organ; it starts working the moment you get up in the morning and does not stop until you get into the office.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Married couples who work together to build and maintain a business assume broad responsibilities. Not only is their work important to our local and national economies, but their success is central to the well-being of their families.
author: Melissa Bean

quote: Work is the curse of the drinking classes.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Nothing is work unless you'd rather be doing something else.
author: George Halas

quote: Economics is extremely useful as a form of employment for economists.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: Blessed is he who has found his work; let him ask no other blessedness.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: To find joy in work is to discover the fountain of youth.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Men for the sake of getting a living forget to live.
author: Margaret Fuller

quote: To fulfill a dream, to be allowed to sweat over lonely labor, to be given a chance to create, is the meat and potatoes of life. The money is the gravy.
author: Bette Davis

quote: Be open to the amazing changes which are occurring in the field that interest you.
author: Leigh Steinberg

quote: Quality is pride of workmanship.
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote: If you must have motivation, think of your paycheck on Friday.
author: Noel Coward

quote: If you put all your strength and faith and vigor into a job and try to do the best you can, the money will come.
author: Lawrence Welk

quote: Work will win when wishy washy wishing won t.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Whatever your life's work is, do it well. A man should do his job so well that the living, the dead, and the unborn could do it no better.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Without work, all life goes rotten. But when work is soulless, life stifles and dies.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Before you start some work, always ask yourself three questions - Why am I doing it, What the results might be and Will I be successful. Only when you think deeply and find satisfactory answers to these questions, go ahead.
author: Chanakya

quote: Luck is a dividend of sweat. The more you sweat, the luckier you get.
author: Ray Kroc

quote: It is the working man who is the happy man. It is the idle man who is the miserable man.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Inspiration comes of working every day.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Being an astronaut is a wonderful career. I feel very privileged. But what I really hope for young people is that they find a career they're passionate about, something that's challenging and worthwhile.
author: Ellen Ochoa

quote: I know you've heard it a thousand times before. But it's true - hard work pays off. If you want to be good, you have to practice, practice, practice. If you don't love something, then don't do it.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: We have a system that increasingly taxes work and subsidizes nonwork.
author: Milton Friedman

quote: Life grants nothing to us mortals without hard work.
author: Horace

quote: Work is not man's punishment. It is his reward and his strength and his pleasure.
author: George Sand

quote: Laziness may appear attractive, but work gives satisfaction.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Honest labor bears a lovely face.
author: Thomas Dekker

quote: Work, apart from devotion or love of God, is helpless and cannot stand alone.
author: Ramakrishna

quote: What you are will show in what you do.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: The end of labor is to gain leisure.
author: Aristotle

quote: Every noble work is at first impossible.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: No fine work can be done without concentration and self-sacrifice and toil and doubt.
author: Max Beerbohm

quote: The harder you work... and visualize something, the luckier you get.
author: Seal

quote: Work expands so as to fill the time available for its completion.
author: C. Northcote Parkinson

quote: If you don't want to work you have to work to earn enough money so that you won't have to work.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: Your chances of success are directly proportional to the degree of pleasure you desire from what you do. If you are in a job you hate, face the fact squarely and get out.
author: Michael Korda

quote: I have been up against tough competition all my life. I wouldn't know how to get along without it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Concentrate on your job and you will forget your other troubles.
author: William Feather

quote: Everyone has been made for some particular work, and the desire for that work has been put in every heart.
author: Rumi

quote: The more I want to get something done, the less I call it work.
author: Richard Bach

quote: We work to become, not to acquire.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The reason a lot of people do not recognize opportunity is because it usually goes around wearing overalls looking like hard work.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Once you start a working on something, don't be afraid of failure and don't abandon it. People who work sincerely are the happiest.
author: Chanakya

quote: O man you are busy working for the world, and the world is busy trying to turn you out.
author: Abu Bakr

quote: There are one hundred men seeking security to one able man who is willing to risk his fortune.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: Do not hire a man who does your work for money, but him who does it for love of it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Ya gots to work with what you gots to work with.
author: Stevie Wonder

quote: Teaching was the hardest work I had ever done, and it remains the hardest work I have done to date.
author: Ann Richards

quote: Going to work for a large company is like getting on a train. Are you going sixty miles an hour or is the train going sixty miles an hour and you're just sitting still?
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: The will to work of everyone in the country is the best guarantee of national survival.
author: Bhumibol Adulyadej

quote: It can be liberating to get fired because you realize the world doesn't end. There's other ways to make money, better jobs.
author: Ron Livingston

quote: You're blessed if you have the strength to work.
author: Mahalia Jackson

quote: Can anything be sadder than work left unfinished? Yes, work never begun.
author: Christina Rossetti

quote: I always got my work done before playing.
author: Edwin Moses

quote: After two weeks of working on a project, you know whether it will work or not.
author: Bill Budge

quote: A good job is more than just a paycheck. A good job fosters independence and discipline, and contributes to the health of the community. A good job is a means to provide for the health and welfare of your family, to own a home, and save for retirement.
author: James H. Douglas, Jr.

quote: People who work together will win, whether it be against complex football defenses, or the problems of modern society.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Work isn't to make money; you work to justify life.
author: Marc Chagall

quote: I guess we all like to be recognized not for one piece of fireworks, but for the ledger of our daily work.
author: Neil Armstrong

quote: To find out what one is fitted to do, and to secure an opportunity to do it, is the key to happiness.
author: John Dewey

quote: By the work one knows the workman.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: The idea of having a steady job is appealing.
author: Robin Williams

quote: I can't imagine anything more worthwhile than doing what I most love. And they pay me for it.
author: Edgar Winter

quote: Every man loves what he is good at.
author: Thomas Shadwell

quote: Two months after I got out of test pilot school, I saw an advert that said NASA was recruiting more astronauts. The best job you could have as a test pilot was being an astronaut, so I volunteered.
author: Charles Duke

quote: I never did a day's work in my life. It was all fun.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: All labor that uplifts humanity has dignity and importance and should be undertaken with painstaking excellence.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: One man's wage increase is another man's price increase.
author: Harold Wilson

quote: I met an American woman and got married so I had to get a job.
author: Walter Wager

quote: Luck? I don't know anything about luck. I've never banked on it and I'm afraid of people who do. Luck to me is something else: Hard work - and realizing what is opportunity and what isn't.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: Work alone is noble.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: When more and more people are thrown out of work, unemployment results.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Management must manage!
author: Harold S. Geneen

quote: No one can arrive from being talented alone, work transforms talent into genius.
author: Anna Pavlova

quote: Big jobs usually go to the men who prove their ability to outgrow small ones.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: There is joy in work. There is no happiness except in the realization that we have accomplished something.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Work is a necessary evil to be avoided.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I'd like to dial it back 5% or 10% and try to have a vacation that's not just e-mail with a view.
author: Elon Musk

quote: To be a poet is a condition, not a profession.
author: Robert Frost

quote: And to get real work experience, you need a job, and most jobs will require you to have had either real work experience or a graduate degree.
author: Donald Norman

quote: I have found in work that you only get back what you put into it, but it does come back gift-wrapped.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: Work is love made visible. And if you cannot work with love but only with distaste, it is better that you should leave your work and sit at the gate of the temple and take alms of those who work with joy.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: The taxpayer - that's someone who works for the federal government but doesn't have to take the civil service examination.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Find a job you like and you add five days to every week.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: I think about my work every minute of the day.
author: Jeff Koons

quote: Most people treat the office manual the way they treat a software manual. They never look at it.
author: James Levine

quote: The greatest teacher I know is the job itself.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: I work 338 days a year, 16 hours a day.
author: Dave Pelzer

quote: I thought the attractions of being an astronaut were actually, not so much the Moon, but flying in a completely new medium.
author: Neil Armstrong

quote: Let us touch the dying, the poor, the lonely and the unwanted according to the graces we have received and let us not be ashamed or slow to do the humble work.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: There is always the danger that we may just do the work for the sake of the work. This is where the respect and the love and the devotion come in - that we do it to God, to Christ, and that's why we try to do it as beautifully as possible.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Big pay and little responsibility are circumstances seldom found together.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: It is your work in life that is the ultimate seduction.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: It is only when I am doing my work that I feel truly alive.
author: Federico Fellini

quote: Anyone who can walk to the welfare office can walk to work.
author: Al Capp

quote: Gentleness doesn't get work done unless you happen to be a hen laying eggs.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: I'm working myself to death.
author: Alan Ladd

quote: When a work lifts your spirits and inspires bold and noble thoughts in you, do not look for any other standard to judge by: the work is good, the product of a master craftsman.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: My experience has been that work is almost the best way to pull oneself out of the depths.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: No person who is enthusiastic about his work has anything to fear from life.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: Give yourself something to work toward - constantly.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: There is no disgrace in working. There was no silver spoon around at the time I was born.
author: Anna Held

quote: I have always argued that change becomes stressful and overwhelming only when you've lost any sense of the constancy of your life. You need firm ground to stand on. From there, you can deal with that change.
author: Richard Nelson Bolles

quote: The pay is good and I can walk to work.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: It's easier to change what you do than people think it is. If you don't change, your field changes around you.
author: Walter Gilbert

quote: Work is accomplished by those employees who have not yet reached their level of incompetence.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: As I understand it, sport is hard work for which you do not get paid.
author: Irvin S. Cobb

quote: A manager is responsible for the application and performance of knowledge.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: I work to stay alive.
author: Bette Davis

quote: Managers in all too many American companies do not achieve the desired results because nobody makes them do it.
author: Harold S. Geneen

quote: Labor gives birth to ideas.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Work is a necessity for man. Man invented the alarm clock.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Work is a prayer. And I start off every morning dedicating it to our Creator.
author: Joseph Murray

quote: I've got a woman's ability to stick to a job and get on with it when everyone else walks off and leaves it.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Because I have work to care about, it is possible that I may be less difficult to get along with than other women when the double chins start to form.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: The biggest job we have is to teach a newly hired employee how to fail intelligently. We have to train him to experiment over and over and to keep on trying and failing until he learns what will work.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: I mean I don't really think about it. You know, do you know what I often say to myself? I think you're very lucky in life if you know what you want to do.
author: Andrew Lloyd Webber

quote: My husband changed jobs so fast that I simply never knew what business he was in.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: I think the person who takes a job in order to live - that is to say, for the money - has turned himself into a slave.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: America believes in education: the average professor earns more money in a year than a professional athlete earns in a whole week.
author: Evan Esar

quote: There's something to be said in favor of working in isolation in the real world.
author: A. R. Ammons

quote: Dreaming in public is an important part of our job description, as science writers, but there are bad dreams as well as good dreams. We're dreamers, you see, but we're also realists, of a sort.
author: William Gibson

quote: Put off thy cares with thy clothes; so shall thy rest strengthen thy labor, and so thy labor sweeten thy rest.
author: Francis Quarles

quote: Instead of being critical of people in authority over you and envious of their position, be happy you're not responsible for everything they have to do. Instead of piling on complaints, thank them for what they do. Overwhelm them with encouragement and appreciation!
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: For the last several years and culminating in six months in orbit next year, I've been training for my third space flight. This one is almost in a category completely different than the previous two, specifically to live in on the space station for six months, to command a space ship and to fly a new rocket ship.
author: Chris Hadfield

quote: On any given day, my father wasn't likely to return from work before I was asleep for the night. I saw that a man's work was important, that he must pursue it tirelessly, and that it might require certain sacrifices, like being away from the warmth and comfort of home.
author: Ezekiel Emanuel

quote: There is a vast world of work out there in this country, where at least 111 million people are employed in this country alone - many of whom are bored out of their minds. All day long.
author: Richard Nelson Bolles

quote: If Botticelli were alive today he'd be working for Vogue.
author: Peter Ustinov

quote: You know, I think the greatest gift in the world is a good employee, you know, or people who can do your work for you and do it well the way you'd like to have it done. And I've always been able to surround myself with really good people.
author: Kenny Rogers

quote: As an actor, to have achieved financial stability is amazing. But I always have this weird fear that I'm not going to get any more work; it's about not having enough money.
author: Paul Giamatti

quote: The economy in the Valley will need to grow if students want to come back and work with their specialized degrees. We need to develop more to create more opportunities.
author: Frank Murphy

quote: And if small businesspeople say they made it on their own, all they are saying is that nobody else worked seven days a week in their place. Nobody showed up in their place to open the door at five in the morning. Nobody did their thinking, and worrying, and sweating for them.
author: Paul Ryan

quote: If you do what you love, you'll never work a day in your life.
author: Marc Anthony

quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
author: Pele

quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.
author: H. L. Hunt

quote: Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.
author: Gail Devers

quote: A gentle word, a kind look, a good-natured smile can work wonders and accomplish miracles.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.
author: George Allen, Sr.

quote: Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency. Consistent hard work leads to success. Greatness will come.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
author: Satchel Paige

quote: I work a lot in the slums of Tondo, Manila, and the life there is poor and very sad. And I've always taught to myself to look for the beauty of it and look in the beauty of the faces of the children and to be grateful.
author: Catriona Gray

quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
author: Newt Gingrich

quote: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Work hard for what you want because it won't come to you without a fight. You have to be strong and courageous and know that you can do anything you put your mind to. If somebody puts you down or criticizes you, just keep on believing in yourself and turn it into something positive.
author: Leah LaBelle

quote: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quote: Hard work always pays off, whatever you do.
author: Dustin Lynch

quote: I used to work with autistic children, and they said a lot of funny things to me.
author: James Acaster

quote: Nature is so powerful, so strong. Capturing its essence is not easy - your work becomes a dance with light and the weather. It takes you to a place within yourself.
author: Annie Leibovitz

quote: There is no substitute for hard work. Never give up. Never stop believing. Never stop fighting.
author: Hope Hicks

quote: The fruit of your own hard work is the sweetest.
author: Deepika Padukone

quote: Many hands make light work.
author: John Heywood

quote: There may be people who have more talent than you, but there's no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do - and I believe that.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: Whatever you do, do with determination. You have one life to live; do your work with passion and give your best. Whether you want to be a chef, doctor, actor, or a mother, be passionate to get the best result.
author: Alia Bhatt

quote: The secret was to just be cool, stay in God's graces, and work it out.
author: Solomon Burke

quote: Self-belief and hard work will always earn you success.
author: Virat Kohli

quote: Dreams can become a reality when we possess a vision that is characterized by the willingness to work hard, a desire for excellence, and a belief in our right and our responsiblity to be equal members of society.
author: Janet Jackson

quote: To be a champion, I think you have to see the big picture. It's not about winning and losing; it's about every day hard work and about thriving on a challenge. It's about embracing the pain that you'll experience at the end of a race and not being afraid. I think people think too hard and get afraid of a certain challenge.
author: Summer Sanders

quote: The road to success is not easy to navigate, but with hard work, drive and passion, it's possible to achieve the American dream.
author: Tommy Hilfiger

quote: Happiness does not come from doing easy work but from the afterglow of satisfaction that comes after the achievement of a difficult task that demanded our best.
author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

quote: Right now I am trying to be in a place of calm, a place where I can chill out and then handle the chaos of life better. You don't just get it overnight; you have to work at it. It's a daily struggle.
author: Jackee Harry

quote: I'm Italian, but some people think I'm Jewish because I work the Yiddish. I also work the Italian, by the way.
author: Joy Behar

quote: Leadership is not about a title or a designation. It's about impact, influence and inspiration. Impact involves getting results, influence is about spreading the passion you have for your work, and you have to inspire team-mates and customers.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: Everybody wants to be famous, but nobody wants to do the work. I live by that. You grind hard so you can play hard. At the end of the day, you put all the work in, and eventually it'll pay off. It could be in a year, it could be in 30 years. Eventually, your hard work will pay off.
author: Kevin Hart

quote: With hard work and dedication, anything is possible.
author: Timothy Weah

quote: It's all about quality of life and finding a happy balance between work and friends and family.
author: Philip Green

quote: Never stop fighting until you arrive at your destined place - that is, the unique you. Have an aim in life, continuously acquire knowledge, work hard, and have perseverance to realise the great life.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: An organization, no matter how well designed, is only as good as the people who live and work in it.
author: Dee Hock

quote: Life is tough, and things don't always work out well, but we should be brave and go on with our lives.
author: Suga

quote: Follow your passion, be prepared to work hard and sacrifice, and, above all, don't let anyone limit your dreams.
author: Donovan Bailey

quote: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.
author: Conan O'Brien

quote: Stay true to yourself, yet always be open to learn. Work hard, and never give up on your dreams, even when nobody else believes they can come true but you. These are not cliches but real tools you need no matter what you do in life to stay focused on your path.
author: Phillip Sweet

quote: When I was a kid I used to pray every night for a new bicycle. Then I realised that the Lord doesn't work that way so I stole one and asked Him to forgive me.
author: Emo Philips

quote: Stay positive and happy. Work hard and don't give up hope. Be open to criticism and keep learning. Surround yourself with happy, warm and genuine people.
author: Tena Desae

quote: Talent is cheaper than table salt. What separates the talented individual from the successful one is a lot of hard work.
author: Stephen King

quote: At the end of the day, you are solely responsible for your success and your failure. And the sooner you realize that, you accept that, and integrate that into your work ethic, you will start being successful. As long as you blame others for the reason you aren't where you want to be, you will always be a failure.
author: Erin Cummings

quote: Play is often talked about as if it were a relief from serious learning. But for children play is serious learning. Play is really the work of childhood.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: I will continue to work as hard as I can to make this organization proud. Every time I step on the field I will give everything I have and I will leave everything I have on the field every single Sunday.
author: Tim Tebow

quote: If you work hard and you do your best, you can do anything.
author: Erin Heatherton

quote: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams.
author: Ben Carson

quote: Focused, hard work is the real key to success. Keep your eyes on the goal, and just keep taking the next step towards completing it. If you aren't sure which way to do something, do it both ways and see which works better.
author: John Carmack

quote: I don't live to work; I work to live.
author: Noel Gallagher

quote: I've been so lucky to work with such great people: people that are such hard workers and have such a respect and appreciation for one another.
author: Blake Lively

quote: The Democrats are the party that says government will make you smarter, taller, richer, and remove the crabgrass on your lawn. The Republicans are the party that says government doesn't work and then they get elected and prove it.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: The work goes on, the cause endures, the hope still lives and the dreams shall never die.
author: Edward Kennedy

quote: You can't get much done in life if you only work on the days when you feel good.
author: Jerry West

quote: Don't think in the morning. That's a big mistake that people make. They wake up in the morning and they start thinking. Don't think. Just execute the plan. The plan is the alarm clock goes off, you get up, you go work out. Get some.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: Good management is the art of making problems so interesting and their solutions so constructive that everyone wants to get to work and deal with them.
author: Paul Hawken

quote: When you have balance in your life, work becomes an entirely different experience. There is a passion that moves you to a whole new level of fulfillment and gratitude, and that's when you can do your best... for yourself and for others.
author: Cara Delevingne

quote: A birthday is just another day where you go to work and people give you love. Age is just a state of mind, and you are as old as you think you are. You have to count your blessings and be happy.
author: Abhishek Bachchan

quote: We are immortal until our work on earth is done.
author: George Whitefield

quote: God has blessed me with an amazing family, friends and work colleagues that have been my joy, my support, and my sanity. I don't know what I'd do without them.
author: Josie Loren

quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Follow your dreams, work hard, practice and persevere. Make sure you eat a variety of foods, get plenty of exercise and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
author: Sasha Cohen

quote: I have so much chaos in my life, it's become normal. You become used to it. You have to just relax, calm down, take a deep breath and try to see how you can make things work rather than complain about how they're wrong.
author: Tom Welling

quote: Normal is getting dressed in clothes that you buy for work, driving through traffic in a car that you are still paying for, in order to get to a job that you need so you can pay for the clothes, car and the house that you leave empty all day in order to afford to live in it.
author: Ellen Goodman

quote: I am very proud of my mom and consider her the most courageous woman I know. With perseverance, sacrifice and hard work, she raised a family of Olympic athletes and gave us the tools and the spirit to succeed. That is something that my brothers and I will always be thankful for.
author: Diana Lopez

quote: Pray as though everything depended on God. Work as though everything depended on you.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: With hard work and effort, you can achieve anything.
author: Antoine Griezmann

quote: If you want to build a ship, don't drum up people to collect wood and don't assign them tasks and work, but rather teach them to long for the endless immensity of the sea.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: It's not all about talent. It's about dependability, consistency, and being able to improve. If you work hard and you're coachable, and you understand what you need to do, you can improve.
author: Bill Belichick

quote: I like work; it fascinates me. I can sit and look at it for hours.
author: Jerome K. Jerome

quote: It has been a long journey, but if you dream and have the ambition and want to work hard, then you can achieve.
author: Mo Farah

quote: A lot of things are going to happen that you can't necessarily control all the time, but you can control what you do after it happens. So that's what I try to do, keep my head up, keep moving forward, stay positive and just work hard.
author: Lonzo Ball

quote: In order to excel, you must be completely dedicated to your chosen sport. You must also be prepared to work hard and be willing to accept constructive criticism. Without one-hundred percent dedication, you won't be able to do this.
author: Willie Mays

quote: Everyone has the ability to increase resilience to stress. It requires hard work and dedication, but over time, you can equip yourself to handle whatever life throws your way without adverse effects to your health. Training your brain to manage stress won't just affect the quality of your life, but perhaps even the length of it.
author: Amy Morin

quote: Knowledge comes, but wisdom lingers. It may not be difficult to store up in the mind a vast quantity of facts within a comparatively short time, but the ability to form judgments requires the severe discipline of hard work and the tempering heat of experience and maturity.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Communication is a skill that you can learn. It's like riding a bicycle or typing. If you're willing to work at it, you can rapidly improve the quality of evry part of your life.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: A good plan today is better than a perfect plan tomorrow. Don't wait for an inspired ending to come to mind. Work your way to the ending and see what comes up.
author: Andy Weir

quote: Everyone's dream can come true if you just stick to it and work hard.
author: Serena Williams

quote: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.
author: John Ruskin

quote: I'm doing things that feel good to my soul. I've had plenty opportunity to do other things, but it didn't feel right, and it wasn't right. And if it feels like work, then it's work. But if you have that opportunity to do what you love, and you can make a living out of it, then that's a blessing and I never take that for granted.
author: Xzibit

quote: I love it when people doubt me. It makes me work harder to prove them wrong.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: Without hard work and discipline it is difficult to be a top professional.
author: Jahangir Khan

quote: Create like a god, command like a king, work like a slave.
author: Constantin Brancusi

quote: Hope begins in the dark, the stubborn hope that if you just show up and try to do the right thing, the dawn will come. You wait and watch and work: you don't give up.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: When work is a pleasure, life is a joy! When work is a duty, life is slavery.
author: Maxim Gorky

quote: The greatest thing about where my life is right now is it's very relaxed and chill. I'm just hanging out, being myself and doing my work.
author: Lucas Grabeel

quote: In football, everything is possible, from the moment you work and you believe in your qualities.
author: Kylian Mbappe

quote: I'm proud of my hard work. Working hard won't always lead to the exact things we desire. There are many things I've wanted that I haven't always gotten. But, I have a great satisfaction in the blessings from my mother and father, who instilled a great work ethic in me both personally and professionally.
author: Tamron Hall

quote: Follow your dreams. If you have a goal, and you want to achieve it, then work hard and do everything you can to get there, and one day it will come true.
author: Lindsey Vonn

quote: I am ready to work, I am ready for this job and I am ready for this challenge.
author: Stuart Pearce

quote: While you're going through this process of trying to find the satisfaction in your work, pretend you feel satisfied. Tell yourself you had a good day. Walk through the corridors with a smile rather than a scowl. Your positive energy will radiate. If you act like you're having fun, you'll find you are having fun.
author: Jean Chatzky

quote: Once you have commitment, you need the discipline and hard work to get you there.
author: Haile Gebrselassie

quote: There are two kinds of people, those who do the work and those who take the credit. Try to be in the first group; there is less competition there.
author: Indira Gandhi

quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: I am a great believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.
author: Stephen Leacock

quote: You have to fight to reach your dream. You have to sacrifice and work hard for it.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic. It takes sweat, determination, and hard work.
author: Kevin-Prince Boateng

quote: Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand, and work with whatever tools you may have at your command, and better tools will be found as you go along.
author: George Herbert

quote: Behaving like a princess is work. It's not just about looking beautiful or wearing a crown. It's more about how you are inside.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: The American Dream I believe in is one that provides anyone willing to work hard enough with the opportunity to succeed.
author: Tammy Duckworth

quote: Confidence is the most important single factor in this game, and no matter how great your natural talent, there is only one way to obtain and sustain it: work.
author: Jack Nicklaus

quote: Great work is done by people who are not afraid to be great.
author: Fernando Flores

quote: Transparency, honesty, kindness, good stewardship, even humor, work in businesses at all times.
author: John Gerzema

quote: One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: My beliefs are that good people who work hard get their rewards. There will be struggle at times and hurdles along the way - life throws up all sorts - but in the end, you will prevail if you stick to the right path.
author: Moeen Ali

quote: The artist is nothing without the gift, but the gift is nothing without work.
author: Emile Zola

quote: Obstacles don't have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don't turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Life is about growth and exploration, not achieving a fixed state of balance. You have a very limited time on earth to experience all that you can. Figuring out how to squeeze the most out of your family, work, and spirituality is your life's purpose. Go do it.
author: Mel Robbins

quote: It sounds simple telling people to work hard and never quit, but to really execute and demonstrate those principles takes discipline and faith. Those are the two factors that I believe separate the good from the great, the successes from the failures.
author: Nipsey Hussle

quote: Whereas most technologies tend to automate workers on the periphery doing menial tasks, blockchains automate away the center. Instead of putting the taxi driver out of a job, blockchain puts Uber out of a job and lets the taxi drivers work with the customer directly.
author: Vitalik Buterin

quote: Let the future tell the truth, and evaluate each one according to his work and accomplishments. The present is theirs; the future, for which I have really worked, is mine.
author: Nikola Tesla

quote: I'm thankful because all the hard work and sacrifices were worth it in the end.
author: WizKid

quote: I have made the choices that work best for me. I know I cannot please everyone, and that's fine.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty, and persistence.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Always work hard and have fun in what you do because I think that's when you're more successful. You have to choose to do it.
author: Simone Biles

quote: Enjoy your sweat because hard work doesn't guarantee success, but without it you don't have a chance.
author: Alex Rodriguez

quote: Teamwork makes the dream work, but a vision becomes a nightmare when the leader has a big dream and a bad team.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Confront the dark parts of yourself, and work to banish them with illumination and forgiveness. Your willingness to wrestle with your demons will cause your angels to sing.
author: August Wilson

quote: I believe that working with good people matters because then the work environment is good. If there is a sense of respect and belief among the people you work with, that is when good work is done.
author: Ranbir Kapoor

quote: Nobody in life gets exactly what they thought they were going to get. But if you work really hard and you're kind, amazing things will happen.
author: Conan O'Brien

quote: The moment we believe that success is determined by an ingrained level of ability as opposed to resilience and hard work, we will be brittle in the face of adversity.
author: Joshua Waitzkin

quote: Work is hard. Distractions are plentiful. And time is short.
author: Adam Hochschild

quote: If you work for it, you'll deserve what comes. Hard work.
author: DeMar DeRozan

quote: My mind rebels at stagnation. Give me problems, give me work, give me the most abstruse cryptogram, or the most intricate analysis, and I am in my own proper atmosphere. But I abhor the dull routine of existence. I crave for mental exaltation.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: When you fail you learn from the mistakes you made and it motivates you to work even harder.
author: Natalie Gulbis

quote: We can each define ambition and progress for ourselves. The goal is to work toward a world where expectations are not set by the stereotypes that hold us back, but by our personal passion, talents and interests.
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: It's a great feeling when your work is appreciated.
author: Jacqueline Fernandez

quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: I faced a number of challenges whilst I built Biocon. Initially, I had credibility challenges where I couldn't get banks to fund me; I couldn't recruit people to work for a woman boss. Even in the businesses where I had to procure raw materials, they didn't want to deal with women.
author: Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw

quote: One measure of your success will be the degree to which you build up others who work with you. While building up others, you will build up yourself.
author: James E. Casey

quote: I feel like a tiger right now. There's nothing impossible if you get up and work for it.
author: Michael Flatley

quote: Through a long and painful process, I've learned that happiness is an inside job - not based on anything or anyone in the outer material world. I've become a different and better person - not perfect, but still a work in progress.
author: Alana Stewart

quote: Inspiration is one thing and you can't control it, but hard work is what keeps the ship moving. Good luck means, work hard. Keep up the good work.
author: Kevin Eubanks

quote: A positive attitude is something everyone can work on, and everyone can learn how to employ it.
author: Joan Lunden

quote: Love and work are the cornerstones of our humanness.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Your ego can become an obstacle to your work. If you start believing in your greatness, it is the death of your creativity.
author: Marina Abramovic

quote: I have no idols. I admire work, dedication and competence.
author: Ayrton Senna

quote: Try to keep your soul always in peace and quiet, always ready for whatever our Lord may wish to work in you. It is certainly a higher virtue of the soul, and a greater grace, to be able to enjoy the Lord in different times and different places than in only one.
author: Saint Ignatius

quote: Luck is great, but most of life is hard work.
author: Iain Duncan Smith

quote: No matter what you achieve, what you want to aspire to be, or how famous and powerful you become, the most important thing is whether you are excited about each and every moment of your life because of your work and people around you.
author: Sushant Singh Rajput

quote: Through hard work and education, we can deliver a strong economy and opportunity for all.
author: Julia Gillard

quote: The work of the individual still remains the spark that moves mankind ahead even more than teamwork.
author: Igor Sikorsky

quote: Believe in yourself, and the rest will fall into place. Have faith in your own abilities, work hard, and there is nothing you cannot accomplish.
author: Brad Henry

quote: Our deep respect for the land and its harvest is the legacy of generations of farmers who put food on our tables, preserved our landscape, and inspired us with a powerful work ethic.
author: James H. Douglas, Jr.

quote: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Every morning, we choose between milk or tea or coffee. Usually, I know what I like, but I don't rule out changing my idea sometimes. The editing process is one of the most important parts in everyday life. The same is with my work: mistakes are part of the decision-making process.
author: Maurizio Cattelan

quote: To have faith doesn't mean you get any less frustrated when you don't do your best, but you know that it's not life and death. Take what you're given, and when you continue to work hard, you will see results. That will give you the confidence you need to keep going.
author: Tom Lehman

quote: It is easy to make promises - it is hard work to keep them.
author: Boris Johnson

quote: We either make ourselves miserable, or we make ourselves strong. The amount of work is the same.
author: Carlos Castaneda

quote: A lot of hard work is hidden behind nice things.
author: Ralph Lauren

quote: Be prepared, work hard, and hope for a little luck. Recognize that the harder you work and the better prepared you are, the more luck you might have.
author: Ed Bradley

quote: Sometimes when you turn a hobby into a job, it becomes work.
author: Jeff Bennett

quote: The work of art is a scream of freedom.
author: Christo

quote: Tell the truth, work hard, and come to dinner on time.
author: Gerald R. Ford

quote: My dad said to me, 'Work hard and be patient.' It was the best advice he ever gave me. You have to put the hours in.
author: Simon Cowell

quote: I'm proud of my work and how far I've come, and I'm proud of the way that I did it.
author: Bebe Rexha

quote: You cannot hope to build a better world without improving the individuals. To that end, each of us must work for his own improvement and, at the same time, share a general responsibility for all humanity, our particular duty being to aid those to whom we think we can be most useful.
author: Marie Curie

quote: The main thing to do is relax and let your talent do the work.
author: Charles Barkley

quote: Formula for success: rise early, work hard, strike oil.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: Don't try to be somebody you're not because it doesn't work. If you try to be this perfect person or perfect persona of what you think that somebody should be when they're involved in public office, it's just not going to work. Just be yourself, stay true to your core values, and really just stay abreast of the issues.
author: Ben Quayle

quote: A professional is someone who can do his best work when he doesn't feel like it.
author: Alistair Cooke

quote: Be extra careful in the work environment with those who like to maintain their position through charm and being political, rather than getting things done. They are very prone to envying and hating those who work hard and get results. They will slander and sabotage you without any warning.
author: Robert Greene

quote: I am grateful for the opportunities I have been given to participate in that work as a representative of my country, Canada, whose people have, I think, shown their devotion to peace.
author: Lester B. Pearson

quote: Just be yourself. Be honest, work towards a goal, and you'll achieve it.
author: Emraan Hashmi

quote: There is no higher religion than human service. To work for the common good is the greatest creed.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: The kind of people that all teams need are people who are humble, hungry, and smart: humble being little ego, focusing more on their teammates than on themselves. Hungry, meaning they have a strong work ethic, are determined to get things done, and contribute any way they can. Smart, meaning not intellectually smart but inner personally smart.
author: Patrick Lencioni

quote: An artist never works under ideal conditions. If they existed, his work wouldn't exist, for the artist doesn't live in a vacuum. Some sort of pressure must exist. The artist exists because the world is not perfect. Art would be useless if the world were perfect, as man wouldn't look for harmony but would simply live in it.
author: Andrei Tarkovsky

quote: The richest people in the world look for and build networks; everyone else looks for work.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: When you go all over the world for work, your dream vacation is your bedroom.
author: Jack Antonoff

quote: We are all born ignorant, but one must work hard to remain stupid.
author: Unknown

quote: The easiest way to stop piracy is not by putting antipiracy technology to work. It's by giving those people a service that's better than what they're receiving from the pirates.
author: Gabe Newell

quote: If you want to become a great chef, you have to work with great chefs. And that's exactly what I did.
author: Gordon Ramsay

quote: Love and work... work and love, that's all there is.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: The thing that is really hard, and really amazing, is giving up on being perfect and beginning the work of becoming yourself.
author: Anna Quindlen

quote: Creativity itself doesn't care at all about results - the only thing it craves is the process. Learn to love the process and let whatever happens next happen, without fussing too much about it. Work like a monk, or a mule, or some other representative metaphor for diligence. Love the work. Destiny will do what it wants with you, regardless.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: Be true to your work, your word, and your friend.
author: John Boyle O'Reilly

quote: God buries His workmen but carries on His work.
author: Charles Wesley

quote: No matter how talented you are or naturally gifted you are, there's no substitute to hard work if you got to maintain standards.
author: Rohit Sharma

quote: If you want something, work hard for it, go after it. I can't worry about all the 'no's, because I believe there's a yes, and I've been very fortunate to find those in my career and made the most of those opportunities.
author: Mara Brock Akil

quote: We are infected by our own misunderstanding of how our own minds work.
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: If you work hard, nothing is impossible.
author: Prabhu Deva

quote: Sometimes hard work doesn't pay off.
author: Jimmy Walker

quote: Much good work is lost for the lack of a little more.
author: Edward H. Harriman

quote: Don't worry about being a star, worry about doing good work, and all that will come to you.
author: Ice Cube

quote: My story is going to be completely different than someone else's story in terms of hard work. What I might feel like is hard work, another person is dying to do.
author: Lil Baby

quote: Colleagues are a wonderful thing - but mentors, that's where the real work gets done.
author: Junot Diaz

quote: Intelligence is the ability to avoid doing work, yet getting the work done.
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: Capitalism is an organized system to guarantee that greed becomes the primary force of our economic system and allows the few at the top to get very wealthy and has the rest of us riding around thinking we can be that way, too - if we just work hard enough, sell enough Tupperware and Amway products, we can get a pink Cadillac.
author: Michael Moore

quote: Some people say video games rot your brain, but I think they work different muscles that maybe you don't normally use.
author: Ezra Koenig

quote: All growth depends upon activity. There is no development physically or intellectually without effort, and effort means work.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Poor people are those who only work to try to keep an expensive lifestyle and always want more and more.
author: Jose Mujica

quote: I like being the underdog so they don't expect what's going to happen. It pushes me to work harder and do the things I'm not doing better.
author: Kawhi Leonard

quote: Any product that needs a manual to work is broken.
author: Elon Musk

quote: There is no magic wand that can resolve our problems. The solution rests with our work and discipline.
author: Jose Eduardo dos Santos

quote: I wanted to go to drama school, but when I got the part in 'Falling,' I got an agent, so it seemed a good idea to work. I always did a lot of singing and dancing, so I am glad it worked out that way. I would like to study stage acting at some point, though.
author: Florence Pugh

quote: Critique, feedback, reaction to one's work or the way they have presented it, regardless of intention, is a gift.
author: Mark Brand

quote: The equal right of all citizens to health, education, work, food, security, culture, science, and wellbeing - that is, the same rights we proclaimed when we began our struggle, in addition to those which emerge from our dreams of justice and equality for all inhabitants of our world - is what I wish for all.
author: Fidel Castro

quote: Take your work seriously, but never yourself.
author: Margot Fonteyn

quote: You will have ups and downs - but believe anything is possible. With hard work, it can come off.
author: Geraint Thomas

quote: I've got a theory that if you give 100% all of the time, somehow things will work out in the end.
author: Larry Bird

quote: Glory is attained from hard work, step by step.
author: Ma Long

quote: He is one of the finest and kindest human beings I have come across. When you meet him, you will understand why he is the Jackie Chan. It's not just for his work but also the kind of person he is.
author: Disha Patani

quote: Education must not simply teach work - it must teach Life.
author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: The secret of joy in work is contained in one word - excellence. To know how to do something well is to enjoy it.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: I would encourage you to set really high goals. Set goals that, when you set them, you think they're impossible. But then every day you can work towards them, and anything is possible, so keep working hard and follow your dreams.
author: Katie Ledecky

quote: A manager is not a person who can do the work better than his men; he is a person who can get his men to do the work better than he can.
author: Frederick W. Smith

quote: Being self-made is a state of mind, and once you put that mentality to work, your success will come.
author: Dave East

quote: Talent is given by God but you should respect it by doing good work.
author: Johnny Lever

quote: Throwing out preclearance when it has worked and is continuing to work to stop discriminatory changes is like throwing away your umbrella in a rainstorm because you are not getting wet.
author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quote: I never do anything half-heartedly. I will continue to work hard and play hard and do everything I can to be successful, whatever I do.
author: David Beckham

quote: True leadership lies in guiding others to success. In ensuring that everyone is performing at their best, doing the work they are pledged to do and doing it well.
author: Bill Owens

quote: We truly believe with hard work, dedication and perseverance, we can become the best at what we do. No one wants to become mediocre.
author: Andy Biersack

quote: Life is a series of baby steps along the way and if you add up these tiny little steps you take toward your goal, whatever it is, whether it's giving up something, a terrible addiction or trying to work your way through an illness. When you total up those baby steps you'd be amazed over the course of 10 years, the strides you've taken.
author: Hoda Kotb

quote: Queering don't make the world work.
author: The Ultimate Warrior

quote: Few will have the greatness to bend history itself; but each of us can work to change a small portion of events, and in the total; of all those acts will be written the history of this generation.
author: Robert Kennedy

quote: There is a saying that every nice piece of work needs the right person in the right place at the right time.
author: Benoit Mandelbrot

quote: Representation of the world, like the world itself, is the work of men; they describe it from their own point of view, which they confuse with the absolute truth.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: Talent! There's no such thing as talent. What they call talent is nothing but the capacity for doing continuous hard work in the right way.
author: Winslow Homer

quote: You just have to find that thing that's special about you that distinguishes you from all the others, and through true talent, hard work, and passion, anything can happen.
author: Dr. Dre

quote: The greatest education in the world is watching the masters at work.
author: Michael Jackson

quote: Football is about sacrifice, dedication, a lot of work, and friendship off the pitch.
author: Edinson Cavani

quote: Work hard, play hard, dream big, love loads, laugh as much as you can, and give back.
author: Deirdre O'Kane

quote: Self-government won't work without self-discipline.
author: Paul Harvey

quote: I hope you will go out and let stories happen to you, and that you will work them, water them with your blood and tears and you laughter till they bloom, till you yourself burst into bloom.
author: Clarissa Pinkola Estes

quote: I feel really humbled and really grateful to have the opportunities that I've had over the past couple of years to work with some amazing people. I think, at this point, I just want to put my head down and grind and do honest work.
author: Ben Schnetzer

quote: Sometimes it takes dealing with a disability - the trauma, the relearning, the months of rehabilitation therapy - to uncover our true abilities and how we can put them to work for us in ways we may have never imagined.
author: Tammy Duckworth

quote: If you have built castles in the air, your work need not be lost; that is where they should be. Now put the foundations under them.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Nothing is given to you. Everything is earned. You have to have that mindset that you have to work every single day. Learn every single day.
author: Saquon Barkley

quote: People work better when they know what the goal is and why. It is important that people look forward to coming to work in the morning and enjoy working.
author: Elon Musk

quote: I will continue to work hard until I get to where I want to be.
author: William Singe

quote: It took a lot of blood, sweat and tears to get to where we are today, but we have just begun. Today we begin in earnest the work of making sure that the world we leave our children is just a little bit better than the one we inhabit today.
author: Barack Obama

quote: People don't understand that when I grew up, I was never the most talented. I was never the biggest. I was never the fastest. I certainly was never the strongest. The only thing I had was my work ethic, and that's been what has gotten me this far.
author: Tiger Woods

quote: I am grateful to have had the opportunity to play for and work under the best, Pat Summitt.
author: Anne Donovan

quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: You can control two things: your work ethic and your attitude about anything.
author: Ali Krieger

quote: A work of art which did not begin in emotion is not art.
author: Paul Cezanne

quote: The essence of science is independent thinking, hard work, and not equipment. When I got my Nobel Prize, I had spent hardly 200 rupees on my equipment.
author: C. V. Raman

quote: I try to keep in mind that it's a long journey. It's not a race. It's about staying focused, continuing to do good work, make my family and community proud; that's all I really want to do... and pay my bills.
author: Gina Rodriguez

quote: Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now. Don't wait for something outside of yourself to make you happy in the future. Think how really precious is the time you have to spend, whether it's at work or with your family. Every minute should be enjoyed and savored.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: I have undertaken vengeance. I want Liberty and Equality to reign in Saint-Domingue. I work to bring them into existence. Unite yourselves to us, brothers, and fight with us for the same cause.
author: Toussaint Louverture

quote: When God created you, He went to great lengths to make you exactly the way He wanted you to be. You are His ultimate work of art.
author: Victoria Osteen

quote: Creating a better world requires teamwork, partnerships, and collaboration, as we need an entire army of companies to work together to build a better world within the next few decades. This means corporations must embrace the benefits of cooperating with one another.
author: Simon Mainwaring

quote: Good leadership consists of showing average people how to do the work of superior people.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: There are a lot of things going on with my life right now that don't just have to do with career. So I have a hard time making decisions about work. That's really a luxury problem.
author: Philip Seymour Hoffman

quote: If four things are followed - having a great aim, acquiring knowledge, hard work, and perseverance - then anything can be achieved.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: I believe you can achieve anything if you work hard enough to get it.
author: Victoria Beckham

quote: Peace is a never ending process... It cannot ignore our differences or overlook our common interests. It requires us to work and live together.
author: Óscar Arias

quote: Wherever smart people work, doors are unlocked.
author: Steve Wozniak

quote: Creativity is a habit, and the best creativity is the result of good work habits.
author: Twyla Tharp

quote: Confidence doesn't come out of nowhere. It's a result of something... hours and days and weeks and years of constant work and dedication.
author: Roger Staubach

quote: A lot of people mistake habit for hard work. Doing something over and over again is not working hard.
author: Shannon Sharpe

quote: I just wanna give a big shout out to all the fans out there who have followed my work up until now. You guys are amazing!! Hearing from fans is the best feeling in the world.
author: Lindsey Shaw

quote: Hard work without talent is a shame, but talent without hard work is a tragedy.
author: Robert Half

quote: Hard work always wins in the end.
author: Lucas Till

quote: Developing a good work ethic is key. Apply yourself at whatever you do, whether you're a janitor or taking your first summer job, because that work ethic will be reflected in everything you do in life.
author: Tyler Perry

quote: If you don't believe in yourself, then who will believe in you? The next man's way of getting there might not necessarily work for me, so I have to create my own ways of getting there.
author: Michael Korda

quote: I did almost every job in the bank. It was real life, waking up in the morning, putting on a suit and tie and then having to go to work.
author: Romain Grosjean

quote: We are constituted so that simple acts of kindness, such as giving to charity or expressing gratitude, have a positive effect on our long-term moods. The key to the happy life, it seems, is the good life: a life with sustained relationships, challenging work, and connections to community.
author: Paul Bloom

quote: We must cultivate our own garden. When man was put in the garden of Eden he was put there so that he should work, which proves that man was not born to rest.
author: Voltaire

quote: I think that passion is the secret ingredient that drives hard work and excellence. My passion is to serve the public: to be in the arena of public policy, to have the opportunity to solve problems for our country, to be in a position where I can make a difference.
author: Kelly Ayotte

quote: Journalism is what we need to make democracy work.
author: Walter Cronkite

quote: Everybody's a work in progress. I'm a work in progress. I mean, I've never arrived... I'm still learning all the time.
author: Renee Fleming

quote: We should judge by talent and work not by community or caste.
author: Nana Patekar

quote: It's always nice when people appreciate your work because it means you've affected them, which is great. And so that feels good.
author: Kirsten Dunst

quote: Neither man nor woman is perfect or complete without the other. Thus, no marriage or family, no ward or stake is likely to reach its full potential until husbands and wives, mothers and fathers, men and women work together in unity of purpose, respecting and relying upon each other's strengths.
author: Sheri L. Dew

quote: Nobody's a natural. You work hard to get good and then work to get better. It's hard to stay on top.
author: Paul Coffey

quote: I really believe that if you want something bad enough, and you work so hard to get it, and you have it inside, then if you just never stop, it's gonna happen.
author: Banks

quote: We are all in this together. We will all make it or none of us will make it. If everyone cleans up their act except one big ole country, it isn't going to work.
author: Ted Danson

quote: You can achieve anything you put your mind and hard work to.
author: Sara Sampaio

quote: We all need to work together, because there are no jobs on a dead planet; there is no equity without rights to decent work and social protection, no social justice without a shift in governance and ambition, and, ultimately, no peace for the peoples of the world without the guarantees of sustainability.
author: Sharan Burrow

quote: Play is the work of childhood.
author: Jean Piaget

quote: It's an honor for me to have the opportunity to work with Emilio Estefan.
author: Jencarlos Canela

quote: Persistence and resilience only come from having been given the chance to work though difficult problems.
author: Gever Tulley

quote: That's been one of my mantras - focus and simplicity. Simple can be harder than complex: You have to work hard to get your thinking clean to make it simple. But it's worth it in the end because once you get there, you can move mountains.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: I feel I'm anonymous in my work. When I look at the pictures, I never see myself; they aren't self-portraits. Sometimes I disappear.
author: Cindy Sherman

quote: If you have a dream, it's definitely achievable through hard work, through dedication, sacrifice, everything.
author: Carli Lloyd

quote: I'm impressed with the people from Chicago. Hollywood is hype, New York is talk, Chicago is work.
author: Michael Douglas

quote: My dad said, 'Stay humble, and you gotta work harder than everybody else.' My mom said, 'Always be yourself.' She always told me only God can judge me.
author: Nate Robinson

quote: I think goals should never be easy, they should force you to work, even if they are uncomfortable at the time.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: We all have goals: We want to matter. We want to be important. We want to have freedom and power to pursue our creative work. We want respect from our peers and recognition for our accomplishments. Not out of vanity or selfishness, but of an earnest desire to fulfill our personal potential.
author: Ryan Holiday

quote: Keep the circus going inside you, keep it going, don't take anything too seriously, it'll all work out in the end.
author: David Niven

quote: I'm lucky to be part of a team who help to make me look good, and they deserve as much of the credit for my success as I do for the hard work we have all put in on the training ground.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: I do not like to work with patients who are in love. Perhaps it is because of envy - I, too, crave enchantment. Perhaps it is because love and psychotherapy are fundamentally incompatible. The good therapist fights darkness and seeks illumination, while romantic love is sustained by mystery and crumbles upon inspection.
author: Irvin D. Yalom

quote: In every community, there is work to be done. In every nation, there are wounds to heal. In every heart, there is the power to do it.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: It's a lot easier to do good work when you have good words to say and work with good people.
author: Mark Harmon

quote: There are those who love to get dirty and fix things. They drink coffee at dawn, beer after work. And those who stay clean, just appreciate things. At breakfast they have milk and juice at night. There are those who do both, they drink tea.
author: Gary Snyder

quote: Women now have choices. They can be married, not married, have a job, not have a job, be married with children, unmarried with children. Men have the same choice we've always had: work, or prison.
author: Tim Allen

quote: To be happy, it first takes being comfortable being in your own shoes. The rest can work up from there.
author: Sophia Bush

quote: There is no substitute for hard work. There is no such thing as an overnight success or easy money.
author: Henry Sy

quote: I always try to do as much as I can do. I'm never a person that does not enough, because I'd regret not doing enough and think I probably could have done more. I probably go too far and have to reel myself back in, which works in some things, and other things it doesn't work.
author: Tom Brady

quote: Sometimes you just have to calm down a little bit and let the system work itself.
author: Blake Griffin

quote: One of the very rewarding aspects of my work has been the interaction with a superb group of colleagues and friends in the atmospheric sciences community.
author: Mario J. Molina

quote: You only live once - but if you work it right, once is enough.
author: Joe E. Lewis

quote: My journey through life has led me through both light and dark places, and it's because of those experiences that I have learned how to work through my character defects and to help others do the same.
author: Jessie Pavelka

quote: I did a business in a box called College Pro Painters. They taught you how to paint houses, how to hire and fire, how to sell, how to deal with customers. You got a one-year franchise. It was the hardest year of my life in terms of hard work. I won manager of the year. It was very successful.
author: Kimbal Musk

quote: Being forced to work, and forced to do your best, will breed in you temperance and self-control, diligence and strength of will, cheerfulness and content, and a hundred virtues which the idle will never know.
author: Charles Kingsley

quote: I work in three shades of black.
author: Rei Kawakubo

quote: You can have anything you want, but not everything. If it was really important to spend an afternoon at my daughter's school, I had to think, how was I going to organize my life to do that? How could I become more efficient? I always tried to put my priorities on the table, personal and professional, and work around them.
author: Laura Lang

quote: Nagasaki and Hiroshima remind us to put peace first every day; to work on conflict prevention and resolution, reconciliation, and dialogue; and to tackle the roots of conflict and violence.
author: Antonio Guterres

quote: We should always look upon ourselves as God's servants, placed in God's world, to do his work; and accordingly labour faithfully for him; not with a design to grow rich and great, but to glorify God, and do all the good we possibly can.
author: David Brainerd

quote: I learned the value of hard work by working hard.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: One of the symptoms of an approaching nervous breakdown is the belief that one's work is terribly important.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: If you want peace work for justice.
author: Pope Paul VI

quote: Women are, in my view, natural peacemakers. As givers and nurturers of life, through their focus on human relationships and their engagement with the demanding work of raising children and protecting family life, they develop a deep sense of empathy that cuts through to underlying human realities.
author: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: God made the integers; all else is the work of man.
author: Leopold Kronecker

quote: It's often been said that you learn more from losing than you do from winning. I think, if you're wise, you learn from both. You learn a lot from a loss. You learn what is it that we're not doing to get to where we want to go. It really gets your attention and it really motivates the work ethic of your team when you're not doing well.
author: Morgan Wootten

quote: I am humbled and excited by new opportunities for me to support and share the amazing work NASA is doing to help us travel farther into the solar system and work with the next generation of science and technology leaders.
author: Scott Kelly

quote: Adopting a really positive attitude can work wonders to adding years to your life, a spring to your step, a sparkle to your eye, and all of that.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: Our work is the presentation of our capabilities.
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: Sticking to good habits can be hard work, and mistakes are part of the process. Don't declare failure simply because you messed up or because you're having trouble reaching your goals. Instead, use your mistakes as opportunities to grow stronger and become better.
author: Amy Morin

quote: I couldn't be luckier to wake up every morning and be so excited to get to work, even if it's five in the morning.
author: Carly Chaikin

quote: The suburb in the 1950s was a bedroom community. The father worked in the city, and the mother stayed home. Now people live and work in the suburbs, and businesses have grown up or moved from cities to certain pockets of what was once the suburbs and created these places that are like cities.
author: Richard Hayne

quote: In general, I think the world is a good place if you work hard, believe in yourself, have good intentions, and if you are kind to people, I believe that good things happen to you.
author: Rachel Platten

quote: Our thoughts are mainly controlled by our subconscious, which is largely formed before the age of 6, and you cannot change the subconscious mind by just thinking about it. That's why the power of positive thinking will not work for most people. The subconscious mind is like a tape player. Until you change the tape, it will not change.
author: Bruce Lipton

quote: Financial freedom is available to those who learn about it and work for it.
